NodeComet is operated in Manila, Philippines.

**Specials**

Budget Shared Hosting

* 2 GB SSD Storage
* 1 TB Bandwidth
* Host 1 Domain
* Unlimited Emails
* No LiteSpeed (Only Apache)

Only **$2.50 PER YEAR**: https://my.nodecomet.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=18

Budget Reseller

* 10 GB Storage
* 1 TB Bandwidth
* Unlimited Clients
* Low-Priority Support
* No SLA Guarantee
* Only 10 in stock

Only **$7 PER YEAR**: https://my.nodecomet.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=19

More specials available at https://nodecomet.com/specials

**Regular Plans**

Shared - Small

* 3 GB SSD Storage
* 1 TB Bandwidth
* Unlimited Domains and Emails
* Free Let's Encrypt SSL
* LiteSpeed + MariaDB
* **$4 per month**

Locations Available: Las Vegas, Luxembourg, Dallas (DDoS Protected)

Order: https://nodecomet.com/shared

Reseller - Small

* 20 GB SSD Storage
* 1 TB Bandwidth
* Unlimited Domains and Emails
* LiteSpeed + MariaDB
* Unlimited Clients
* **No LiteSpeed, only Apache**
* **$2 per month**

Reseller - Large

* 40 GB SSD Storage
* 1 TB Bandwidth
* Unlimited Domains and Emails
* LiteSpeed + MariaDB
* Unlimited Clients
* **No LiteSpeed, only Apache**
* **$4 per month**

Locations Available: Canada

Order: https://nodecomet.com/reseller

Our terms and conditions can be found at https://nodecomet.com/terms

<small>And yes, our Luxembourg and Las Vegas locations are BuyShared resellers.</small>
